full_summary:
# TASK BASED INFORMATICS PROFESSIONAL SERVICES (TBIPS) for the Automatic Identification Technology (AIT) Project

## Tender Details
* **Reference Number:** PW-22-01017495
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Solicitation Number:** W8474-23AI01/A
* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-19
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-18T13:00:00

## Notice Type
This is a Request for Proposal for the provision of Task-Based Informatiques Professional Services (TBIPS) for the Automatic Identification Technology (AIT) Project.

## Contract Details
* **Estimated quantity of resources:** 3
* **Duration of initial contract:** March 1, 2023 to February 28, 2025
* **Duration of option period:** March 1, 2025 to February 28, 2026

## Conflict of Interest
Please be aware that any Supplier Arrangement (SA) Holder issued a contract under this TBIPS procurement (W8474-23AI01) will be ineligible from participating in the larger Automatic Identification Technology procurement posted on Canadabuys, solicitation reference number W6381-180019/B.

## Contact Information
* **Name:** Chris Ventura
* **Email:** chris.ventura@forces.gc.ca
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada

## Contracting Entity
* **Name:** Department of National Defence
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A0K2, Canada

## Procurement Method
* The tendering process is Competitive - Selective tendering.

## GCON relating to the contract is D302AAI and D302AAR.

## Related Trade Agreements:
* This project is open to bidders who can comply with one or more the following trade agreements:

    + Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    + Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    + Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
    + Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
    + Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    + Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    + Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    + Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    + Canada-Colombia Free
